testcase.name: Test Case19
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks on 'Products' button to see products.......................passed Then Verify that Brands are visible on left side bar........................passed Then user Clicks any brand name to navigate brands.........................passed Then Verify that user is navigated to brand page and brand products are displayed.passed Then On left side bar, click on any other brand link........................passed Then Verify that user is navigated to that brand page and can see products..passed
